name: Lettuce Collaborate
description:
Lettuce Collaborate:

Hehe get it? Let us collaborate? Ok I didn't make this pun but it's great.

Swap control of Turtle and Rabbit to make your way to the giant lettuce! Watch out, Rabbit is really picky about getting wet and could Turtle walk any slower?

Controls:

WASD or ARROW KEYS to move around.

E to swap characters.
